dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 2550 IH: Special Diabetes Program Reauthorization Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. DeGette (for herself and Mr. Bilirakis) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To extend funding for Special Diabetes Programs for Type I diabetes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Special Diabetes Program Reauthorization Act of 2023.

section.header: Extension of Special Diabetes Programs for Type I diabetes
section.text: Section 330B(b)(2)(D) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 254câ€“2(b)(2)(D)) is amended by striking 2018 through 2023 and inserting 2018 through 2028.
